content.query:
/* select all rows,columns using 
openrowset which reads the data stored in datalake and 
bulk is uded to specify the location, format indicated the format of files present in datalake. 
alias is used since openrowset is stored as virtual table */

select * 
from openrowset(Bulk
'https://airbnbstoreacc.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/airbnbsilver/',
 format = 'Parquet'
 ) as Openrowsetquery
